snippet.title: Evertwine - Prototype Gameplay - June 2022 - Grassland
snippet.description:
Evertwine is a trading card game that uses blockchain technology which means that you actually own the cards you play with. Collect cards, battle, and trade with other players. The best part of it all — paywalls will not stop you from experiencing the full scope of the game. No more Pay-to-Win! Start playing for free and improve your skills to uncover all the possibilities Evertwine has to offer. Climb the ranks by defeating other players in PvP or enjoy exploring the world and playing against creatures and NPCs in PvE. Every season brings new tournaments, cards, and rewards. Discover your potential, build your perfect deck and earn valuable prizes.

Linktree: https://linktr.ee/evertwine
Website: https://evertwine.io/
Discord: https://discord.gg/VBDwYgmT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/evertwine
Telegram: https://t.me/Evertwine
Medium: https://medium.com/@evertwine
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/evertwine/

#PlayToEarn #NFT #blockchain #Evertwine #gamedev #indiedev #indiegame
